mapper.update: update app_company_info set company_info_id = #{companyInfoId}, company_name = #{companyName}, address_line1 = #{addressLine1}, address_line2 = #{addressLine2}, city_id = #{cityId}, province_id = #{provinceId}, country_id = #{countryId}, postal_code = #{postalCode} where company_info_id = #{companyInfoId};
